org.yajasi.JungleJepps.db
Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
  org.yajasi.JungleJepps.db.SettingsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueByEnum
public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueByEnum

This class is used to store all the persistent settings. This class makes use of the Java properties persistence using a simple key- value pairing storage in plain text. This class has wrapper methods such that other classes can store arrays or field labels. Note the warying difference when using a Settings ENUM or a Field ENUM as the primary key.

Author:
Joel Jeske

LABEL_PREFIX

private static final java.lang.String LABEL_PREFIX
Each field has a label. This is the prefix to differentiate the field label from the field defaults or the field override.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULTS_PREFIX

private static final java.lang.String DEFAULTS_PREFIX
Some fields are a drop down list that has default options. This is the prefix to differentiate the field defaults from the field label or the field override.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OVERRIDE_PREFIX

private static final java.lang.String OVERRIDE_PREFIX
Some fields may be overridden from a 3rd party db. This is the prefix to differentiate the field override from the field label or the field defaults.

See Also:
